<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="88" y="-11"><field name="trigger">entity_dies</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="3"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">EntityPlayer</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="execute_command"><comment pinned="true" h="80" w="160">When a player dies, their rupees must be dropped instead of a random amount.</comment><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">loot spawn ~ ~ ~ loot zelda_mod:entities/rupee_drops</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF1"><block
